about.about-description: I  am a developer based in India focused on creating interactive digital experiences on the web, working with brands and industry leaders such as MARIOTT, EXXON MOBIL, ILLUMINA, and HERO amongst others to achieve this.

featured-projects-array.project-desciption: Single handedly provided estimates and delivered entire sprint stories. Additionally, implemented interactive maps using leaflet JS for order tracking. Tech Stack: AngularJS, Javascript, Jquery, Sass, Bootstrap, Karma, Jasmine.

Front End Web Developer for Software download manager with the client, a Health Care and Life Sciences company based out of San Diego, California. Tech Stack: Angular 10, Typescript, HTML, SCSS, Jasmine, Karma, Material.
Transforming Digital Presence of Mariott by imolementing new features and transforming old legacy codebase from Jquery into ReactJs. Tech Stack: HTML, Javascript, Jquery, Sass, Bootstrap, ReactJs

Transforming the digital marketing capability, strategy and unifying the SFCC technology platform across the 3 brands acquired by Hero. Worked on customizing the SFCC platform from design Frontend to Backend functionality of PDP, PLP, Cart, Checkout, Customer and Order modules. Tech Stack: ISML, Javascript, Jquery, Sass, Bootstrap, SFCC.

ice-breaker.ice-breaker-desription: I listen to Lofi amd Electronic music all the time. I love dancing, dogs, skating and sports(MAYBE). I like traveling and good food (work with me so I can fund this). GET IN TOUCH to know more about me.

contact-me.contact-me-text: Got a question, proposal or project or want to work together on something? Feel free to reach out.
